ComicInfo.Summary:
The conclusion to the heart-stopping action of Stargate Atlantis Hearts & Minds is here! Janus' plans are revealed and the Atlantis team must find a way to stop this mad genius before he unleashes a terrifying wave of destruction. Exciting Sci-Fi action explodes as Stargate Atlantis continues storylines of the classic television series in comics! Stargate Atlantis Hearts & Minds comes with four variant covers by interior artist Greg LaRocque, Sci-Fi fine artist Dan Parsons B&W Villains Cover, a Photo Cover, and an exclusive Retailer Incentive Flashback Photo Cover.
